title: I.Sicily inscription 000120
support: The inscription is most likely a marble plaque, but Gualtherus simply reports 'in marmore'.

layout.p: Gualtherus reports extensive but not entirely consistent use of hederae between words.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, first recorded by Gualtherus in 1624 'Apud Pet. Schiattinum'

provenanceLost._: The stone has not been seen since Gualtherus
